line.comment: * SCRIPT NAME: Renegades.Plot.DropReward.xml
* DESCRIPTION: Drops a reward upon renegade destruction, boarding operation, or bail.
* AUTHOR: DATE: 7 November 2025
* Renegade ships spawned in random unknown sectors throughout the game (roamers) are the only renegades in the RenegadeShipList. These are the ones that drop clues
* and rewards. Other renegade ships are solely those owned by the main Renegades Station and used for invasions. Those are not in this list and do not drop clues or loot
* because no clues are needed if a player is already killing one, and only the roamers are 'collecting bribes' from commonwealth ships, not the renegade home fleet.
* $removed = [FALSE]
* Abandoned ships can also be [Unknown], so check if it's a valid renegade
* $t = 'Renegade ' + [THIS] + ' was disposed of in sector ' + $sector
* display subtitle text: text=$t duration=3000 ms
* If the player manages to board, bail, or destroy a renegade ship, we need a reward.
* Note, this does not include renegade ships in the Renegades plot sector.
* Because this is hard out in a remote sector, reward far more if not in a player sector.
* Add-Ons 1.2: Added mercenary check.
* Reward - Drop the motha-load of Crystals.
* Add-Ons 1.4.24: Crystal rewards are now determiined at the start of the game. For existing saves, this global variable must be initialized.
* When a renegade dies, we pop the frontmost crystal type, then add a new one to the end.
* Add-Ons 1.4.24: The value is now determined based on the ship's relValue - still approximately within the old range. This ensures no save scumming for randomized quantities.
* Old: 500k to 1M credit value
* New: relValue * 100
* Because the value is now determined by relValue and M3s are ~10x cheaper than M6s, we multiply the value by 3.33x.
* This gives a range equivalent to the old system, where the payout is 166k to 333k for M3s since M3s are far easier to defeat. See Renegades.Plot.GetRandomShip for ship types.
* Add-Ons 1.1: If the ship was captured (bail or board), reward increased by 20%.
* If in a player sector, it's easy for the player to kill us so make reward far less.
* Add-Ons 1.3: insane mode reduces the reward by 1/3rd.
* Drop a clue
